basic.description:
{Basic Luck}

Increases {luck by 1} and cast {Fortune} at battle opening for {10 rounds}.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Luck}

Increases {luck by 2} and cast {Fortune} at battle opening for {25 rounds}.

expert.description:
{Expert Luck}

Increases {luck by 3} and cast {Fortune} at battle opening for {50 rounds}.
